title: "we removed hard cc from assassins for counterplay issues"
body:
{{champion:1}} {{champion:134}} But somehow, mages are able to be safe from miles away, and burst you while having an almost impossible to dodge stun.

Most teamcomps in worlds only have 1-2 melees, and those usually on the jungler or a splitpush only toplane. Range is just a huge advantage and champions currently pay to little for that, or champs that lack range don't get compensated enough for most of it.
